Type%20Definitions.html#/c:NSFetchReques.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKey
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:NSFetchReques.abstract: Typedef for fetch request options key that should be used with KBA_fetchRequestWithOptions:.

Type%20Definitions.html#/c:NSManagedObje.name: KBACoreDataCompletionBlock
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:NSManagedObje.abstract: Typedef for a block used when performing asynchronous fetches.

Protocols/KBAManagedObjectPropertyMappin.name: -entityPropertyKeyForJSONKey:entityName:
Protocols/KBAManagedObjectPropertyMappin.abstract: Return the entity property name for the JSON key. For example, first_name -> firstName.

Protocols/KBAManagedObjectPropertyMappin.name: -JSONKeyForEntityPropertyKey:entityName:
Protocols/KBAManagedObjectPropertyMappin.abstract: Return the JSON key for the entity property name. For example, firstName -> first_name.

Protocols/KBAManagedObjectPropertyMappin.name: -entityPropertyValueForEntityPropertyKey:value:entityName:context:
Protocols/KBAManagedObjectPropertyMappin.abstract: Return the entity property value for property key and entity name in context.

Protocols/KBAManagedObjectPropertyMappin.name: -JSONValueForEntityPropertyKey:value:entityName:context:
Protocols/KBAManagedObjectPropertyMappin.abstract: Return the JSON value for the entity property key, value, and entity name in context.

Protocols/KBAManagedObjectEntityMapping..name: -entityNameForJSONEntityName:
Protocols/KBAManagedObjectEntityMapping..abstract: Return the entity name for JSON key. For example, my_document -> MyDocument.

Protocols/KBAManagedObjectEntityMapping..name: -JSONEntityNameForEntityName:
Protocols/KBAManagedObjectEntityMapping..abstract: Return the JSON key for entity name. For example, MyDocument -> my_document.

Protocols/KBAFetchedResultsObserverDeleg.name: -fetchedResultsObserverWillChange:
Protocols/KBAFetchedResultsObserverDeleg.abstract: Called before the fetched results observer updates its content. Corresponds to the controllerWillChangeContent: NSFetchedResultsControllerDelegate method.

Protocols/KBAFetchedResultsObserverDeleg.name: -fetchedResultsObserverDidChange:
Protocols/KBAFetchedResultsObserverDeleg.abstract: Called after the fetched results observer updates its content. Corresponds to the controllerDidChangeContent: NSFetchedResultsControllerDelegate method.

Protocols/KBAFetchedResultsObserverDeleg.name: -fetchedResultsObserver:didObserveChanges:
Protocols/KBAFetchedResultsObserverDeleg.abstract: Called after the fetched results observer updates its content, provides a an array of objects conforming to KBAFetchedResultsObserverChange protocol that describe each individual change.

Protocols/KBAFetchedResultsObserverChang.name: changeIndexPath
Protocols/KBAFetchedResultsObserverChang.abstract: The index path of the changed object. Will be nil for deletes.

Protocols/KBAFetchedResultsObserverChang.name: changeNewIndexPath
Protocols/KBAFetchedResultsObserverChang.abstract: The new index path for the changed object. Will be non-nil only for moves.

Protocols/KBAManagedObjectEntityMapping..name: KBAManagedObjectEntityMapping
Protocols/KBAManagedObjectEntityMapping..abstract: Protocol for objects that map JSON keys to entity names.

Protocols/KBAManagedObjectPropertyMappin.name: KBAManagedObjectPropertyMapping
Protocols/KBAManagedObjectPropertyMappin.abstract: Protocol for objects that map JSON keys to managed object property names.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyEntityName
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: The entity name. This should be an NSString.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyIncludesSubentities
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: Whether to include subentities. This should be a NSNumber wrapping a BOOL value.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyPredicate
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: The NSPredicate to filter the fetch request.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyFetchLimit
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: The fetch limit. This should be a NSNumber wrapping an unsigned integer.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyFetchOffset
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: The fetch offset. This should be a NSNumber wrapping an unsigned integer.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyFetchBatchSize
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: The fetch batch size. This should be a NSNumber wrapping an unsigned integer.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeySortDescriptors
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: The NSArray of NSSortDescriptor instances for the fetch request.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyRelationshipKeyPathsForPrefetching
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: The NSArray of NSString instances used for relationship prefetching.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyResultType
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: The result type of the fetch request. This should be a NSNumber wrapping a NSFetchRequestResultType value.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyIncludesPendingChanges
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: Whether to include pending changes. This should be a NSNumber wrapping a BOOL value.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyPropertiesToFetch
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: The NSArray of NSString instances for the properties to fetch.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyReturnsDistinctResults
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: Whether to return distinct results. This should be a NSNumber wrapping a BOOL value.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyIncludesPropertyValues
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: Whether to include property values. This should be a NSNumber wrapping a BOOL value.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyShouldRefreshRefetchedObjects
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: Whether to refresh refetched objects. This should be a NSNumber wrapping a BOOL value.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyReturnsObjectsAsFaults
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: Whether to return objects as faults. This should be a NSNumber wrapping a BOOL value.

Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.name: KBANSFetchRequestOptionsKeyPropertiesToGroupBy
Constants.html#/c:@KBANSFetchRequestOpti.abstract: The NSArray of NSString instances for the properties to group by.

Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.name: delegate
Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.abstract: Set and get the delegate of the receiver.

Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.name: predicate
Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.abstract: Set and get the predicate of the original fetch request that was passed in during initialization. Setting this to a new value will reload the fetched objects.

Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.name: tableView
Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.abstract: Set and get the table view instance the receiver should manage.

Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.name: collectionView
Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.abstract: Set and get the collection view instance the receiver should manage.

Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.name: fetchedObjects
Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.abstract: Get the fetched objects from the underlying fetched results controller.

Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.name: fetchedSections
Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.abstract: Get the fetched sections from the underlying fetched results controller.

Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.name: -initWithFetchRequest:context:
Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.abstract: Calls through to initWithFetchRequest:context:sectionNameKeyPath:cacheName:, passing nil for sectionNameKeyPath and cacheName.

Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.name: -initWithFetchRequest:context:sectionNameKeyPath:cacheName:
Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.abstract: Creates and returns an initialized instance with the provided parameters.

Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.name: -reloadFetchedObjects
Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.abstract: Reload the fetched objects and any views being managed by the receiver.

Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.name: -objectAtIndexPath:
Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.abstract: Returns the fetched object at the provided indexPath.

Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.name: -indexPathForObject:
Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html#/.abstract: Returns the index path for the fetched object, or nil if no such index path exists.

Classes/KBAFetchedResultsController.html.name: -initWithFetchRequest:managedObjectContext:sectionNameKeyPath:cacheName:relationshipKeyPaths:
Classes/KBAFetchedResultsController.html.abstract: Create and return an instance of the receiver with the provided parameters.

Classes/KBARelationshipKeyPath.html#/c:o.name: destinationEntityName
Classes/KBARelationshipKeyPath.html#/c:o.abstract: Get the destination entity name. Given A is related to B, the destination entity name would be B.entity.name.

Classes/KBARelationshipKeyPath.html#/c:o.name: destinationPropertyNames
Classes/KBARelationshipKeyPath.html#/c:o.abstract: Get the destination property names to observe for changes. Given A is related to B, these should be names of properties on B.

Classes/KBARelationshipKeyPath.html#/c:o.name: inverseRelationshipKeyPath
Classes/KBARelationshipKeyPath.html#/c:o.abstract: Get the inverse relationship key path. Given A is related to B, this should be relationship key path from B to A.

Classes/KBARelationshipKeyPath.html#/c:o.name: -initWithDestinationEntityName:destinationPropertyNames:inverseRelationshipKeyPath:
Classes/KBARelationshipKeyPath.html#/c:o.abstract: Create and return an instance of the receiver with the provided parameters.

Classes/KBARelationshipKeyPath.html.name: KBARelationshipKeyPath
Classes/KBARelationshipKeyPath.html.abstract: KBARelationshipKeyPath is an NSObject subclass that represents a relationship key path to observe for changes.

Classes/KBAFetchedResultsController.html.name: KBAFetchedResultsController
Classes/KBAFetchedResultsController.html.abstract: KBAFetchedResultsController is a NSFetchedResultsController subclass that takes an additional argument in its initializer for observing relationship key paths for changes.

Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html.name: KBAFetchedResultsObserver
Classes/KBAFetchedResultsObserver.html.abstract: KBAFetchedResultsObserver is an NSObject subclass that wraps an instance of NSFetchedResultsController and handles updating a view instance in response to its changes.

Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAI.name: KBA_defaultIdentityKey
Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAI.abstract: Set and get the key used for testing equality when importing. If you require a custom key, this should be set before calling KBA_importJSON:entityOrder:entityMapping:completion:.

Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAI.name: KBA_defaultDateFormatter
Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAI.abstract: Set and get the date formatter used to convert between JSON and NSDate objects.

Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAI.name: +KBA_propertyMappingForEntityNamed:
Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAI.abstract: Get the object responsible for mapping between entity properties and JSON keys.

Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAI.name: +KBA_registerPropertyMapping:forEntityNamed:
Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAI.abstract: Register a property mapping for a particular entity.

Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAI.name: -KBA_managedObjectWithDictionary:entityName:propertyMapping:error:
Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAI.abstract: Returns a NSManagedObject of entityName by mapping keys and values in dictionary using propertyMapping.

Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAI.name: -KBA_importJSON:entityOrder:entityMapping:completion:
Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAI.abstract: Imports the provided JSON, creating managed objects for each entry using entityMapping, which maps between JSON keys and entity names. Invokes the completion block when the operation is finished.

Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAE.name: -KBA_fetchEntityNamed:predicate:sortDescriptors:limit:offset:error:
Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAE.abstract: Constructs and executes a NSFetchRequest using entityName, predicate, sortDescriptors, limit, offset, and error.

Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAE.name: -KBA_fetchEntityNamed:predicate:sortDescriptors:limit:offset:completion:
Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAE.abstract: Performs an asynchronous fetch request, using NSAsynchronousFetchRequest if it is available. Falls back to fetching object IDs and converting them to managed objects on the calling thread.

Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAE.name: -KBA_countForEntityNamed:predicate:error:
Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAE.abstract: Constructs and executes a NSFetchRequest using entityName, predicate, and error.

Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAE.name: -KBA_fetchPropertiesForEntityNamed:properties:predicate:sortDescriptors:error:
Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAE.abstract: Constructs and executes a NSFetchRequest using entityName, predicate, sortDescriptors, and error.

Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAE.name: -KBA_fetchWithOptions:
Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAE.abstract: Creates and executes a NSFetchRequest with the provided options.

Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAE.name: -KBA_fetchWithOptions:error:
Categories/NSManagedObjectContext%28KBAE.abstract: Creates and executes a NSFetchRequest with the provided options and error.

Categories/NSFetchRequest%28KBAExtension.name: +KBA_fetchRequestForEntityName:predicate:sortDescriptors:limit:offset:
Categories/NSFetchRequest%28KBAExtension.abstract: Create and return a NSFetchRequest with the provided parameters. Calls through to KBA_fetchRequestWithOptions: with the appropriate options dictionary.

Categories/NSFetchRequest%28KBAExtension.name: +KBA_fetchRequestWithOptions:
Categories/NSFetchRequest%28KBAExtension.abstract: Create and return a fetch request with the provided options.

Type%20Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type%20Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
